Judul: COMPARISON ANALYSIS BETWEEN MURABAHAH IN SYARIAH BANK WITH HOUSE OWNERSHIP CREDIT IN CONVENTIONAL BANK FROM CLIENTS POINT OF VIEW
Abstrak:
ABSTRACT:  
 
 

Nowadays, business competition between banks is getting keener and keener, and each bank creates various products and business systems which present multiple competitive advantages. The increasing demand for financing institution has encouraged banks to offer financing facility to the public. One of those facilities, which is the most popular one, is house financing credit that answers the high public demand for house
